title: For This I Am Grateful
description: In this newly revised hardcover edition, For This I Am Grateful presents a collection of meaningful insights from everyday people as they share the special moments that have enriched their lives. Complete with many new entries and photographs, this inspirational assortment has a fresh and engaging package perfect for gift giving. For This I Am Grateful covers a spectrum of experiences, from humorous to poignant to spiritual. And whether an entry tickles the funny bone or tugs at the heart, each one serves to remind us that we have much to be grateful for.
author: All of Us
